data.meanings: To heat, become hot or very hot, melt. Boiling water. Loyal/close friend/relative. Black smoke.
data.sentence: The word حَمِيمٍ comes from the root ح م م and is associated with the meanings: To heat, become hot or very hot, melt. Boiling water. Loyal/close friend/relative. Black smoke.

data.meanings: to mingle/mix, he adulterated/sophisticated it, to confound/confuse. shawb - mixture for drink.
data.sentence: The word لَشَوْبًا comes from the root ش و ب and is associated with the meanings: to mingle/mix, he adulterated/sophisticated it, to confound/confuse. shawb - mixture for drink.
